title: Can I do a B.Ed and B.Libs degree simultaneously from different universities? - Quora

response.answer_text: If u r doing a B.Lib it would be enough to get u a job. Its risky to do 2 professional courses even if urs allowed. I doubt if its allowed as both require 75% n original documents. Also their will be a technical problem when u apply for a job on how u did u do 2 courses full time at the same time. It will cause problems in post approval
